revised_title: Effects of Excess Carbon Dioxide on Plant Growth and Structure
tldr: This study investigates the effects of increased carbon dioxide levels on plant growth and structure. The research found that plants exposed to higher levels of carbon dioxide had stunted growth, smaller leaves, and altered stomatal behavior. The study also observed differences in the vascular and mechanical tissues of the plants, with the control plants having better-developed collenchyma and pericyclic sclerenchyma.
